name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lazy Skip | Bot To Auto Remove All YouTube Ad

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web extension that removes all YouTube ads without ever getting you a warning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you too lazy to wait for YouTube ad skip button??
Lazy Skip is here to help you just with that âœ¨ðŸ¥³

1) Install It
2) Enjoy 
Simple enough, I guess :)

All bugs have been fixed in v6 ðŸŽ‰

Unlike other ad-blocker it skips ads before they appear, and you won't get any warnings/strikes from YouTube.
 
[VERSION HISTORY]
[31/05/24] v6: YouTube updated class name in source code, fixed.
[13/02/24] v5: fixed more bugs for un-skippable ads.
[09/02/24] v4: fixed bugs, removes banner and player ads.
[25/01/24] v3: fully automated, can works on un-skippable ads.
[17/01/24] v2: automated but reload page for un-skippable ads.
[11/01/24] v1: reload the YouTube page to remove ads.
